cdbrecord.electronic_stopping_comment: for all atoms with K.E. >10 eV; see publication
cdbrecord.comments: This data set is provided as part of the IAEA Challenge: "Modelling Damage in a Fusion Reactor", April 2018 – June 2018. See https://challenge.iaea.org/ for more details.
